note.p: Snuff manufacturer. Daughter of William and Ann Amoore of Angmering, Sussex. Married Robert Ansell of Carshalton, Surrey, in 1819. Mother of George Frederick Ansell (ODNB). Snuff manufacturer, 1871.
Census returns 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1079/3/21/8), 1851 (HO107/1592/72/16), 1871 (RG10/687/84/36)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 29 May 2020)

p.hi: England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 29 May 2020)
